    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static DsnFile.ReadResult read(java.io.InputStream p_input_stream,
                                      BoardHandling p_board_handling,
                                      BoardObservers p_observers,
                                      IdNoGenerator p_item_id_no_generator,
                                      TestLevel p_test_level)
        Creates a routing board from a Specctra dns file. The parameters p_item_observers and p_item_id_no_generator are used, in case the board is embedded into a host system. Returns false, if an error occured.
        Parameters:
        p_input_stream - a InputStream object.
        p_board_handling - a BoardHandling object.
        p_observers - a BoardObservers object.
        p_item_id_no_generator - a IdNoGenerator object.
        p_test_level - a TestLevel object.
        Returns:
        a DsnFile.ReadResult object.

      • write

        public static boolean write(BoardHandling p_board_handling,
                            java.io.OutputStream p_file,
                            java.lang.String p_design_name,
                            boolean p_compat_mode)
        Writes p_board to a text file in the Specctra dsn format. Returns false, if the write failed. If p_compat_mode is true, only standard speecctra dsn scopes are written, so that any host system with an specctra interface can read them.
        Parameters:
        p_board_handling - a BoardHandling object.
        p_file - a OutputStream object.
        p_design_name - a String object.
        p_compat_mode - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a boolean.
